attributes.action: Modify the smoking legislation to allow individual public houses to 'Opt out'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this way it will give the freedom back to the comsumer to chose to enter or pass by the public house.  A sign would be displayed saying smoking or non smoking at the entrance to each premisis.
This is a free country, so let the people chose.

rejection.details:
There are already several of petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=smoking
Please consider signing one of those, rather than creating another
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
